messages.content: SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500;
Show me products in the Electronics category.
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND rating >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE sale_price IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%wireless headphones%';
Find me red shoes in size 9.
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%red shoes%' AND stock > 0;
What’s the status of my latest order?
SELECT shipping_status FROM orders WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 1;
Show me orders made in the last month.
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE user_id = 1 AND order_date >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH;
How many items are in my last order?
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_items FROM order_products WHERE order_id = (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 1);
What’s the total cost of Order ID 123?
SELECT total_price FROM orders WHERE id = 123;
Can I reorder items from my last order?
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM order_products WHERE order_id = (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 1);
What products are in Order ID 456?
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM order_products WHERE order_id = 456;
Show me the details of my latest order.
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 1;
What’s the estimated delivery date for my last order?

SELECT estimated_delivery_days FROM shipping_options WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM order_products WHERE order_id = (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 1));
Did I buy any smartphones recently?
SELECT * FROM orders o JOIN order_products op ON o.id = op.order_id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id WHERE o.user_id = 1 AND p.name LIKE '%smartphone%';
What’s available in the Home category?
List all items priced between $30 and $50.
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
Which products have less than 5 items in stock?

SELECT p.name, COUNT(op.product_id) AS purchase_count FROM order_products op JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id WHERE op.order_id IN (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 1) GROUP BY op.product_id ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;
How many orders has each user made?
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY user_id;
What is the total revenue from all orders?
SELECT SUM(total_price) AS total_revenue FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE sale_price IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE tags LIKE '%clearance%';
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date <= CURDATE() AND end_date >= CURDATE();
Show all products with a rating of 4.5 or higher.
SELECT * FROM products WHERE created_at >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAY;
SELECT p.name, SUM(op.quantity) AS total_sold FROM order_products op JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY total_sold DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
What are the best deals in Fashion?
SELECT * FROM promotions p JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.id WHERE pr.category = 'Fashion';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE tags LIKE '%eco-friendly%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Accessories' ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 10;
What’s the cheapest item in Electronics?
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%gift card%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%blue T-shirt%';
